cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid format '999.999.999.999' will cause network interface configuration failure and AMF connection error.

du.explanation_en: Setting rsrp_ThresholdSSB to 200 exceeds the valid range for RSRP threshold (typically -140 to -44 dBm), causing invalid RACH configuration and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 rsrp_ThresholdSSB 設定為 200 超過 RSRP 閾值的有效範圍（通常為 -140 到 -44 dBm），會導致無效的 RACH 配置和細胞設定失敗。
